rows.label: qst003201_msg0001
rows.name: N-no, no, no! Wh-wh-what should I do?!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0002
rows.name: I can't go help him myself...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0004
rows.name: Bonono-kun! He went whoooosh and fell!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0005
rows.name: It's not okay! It was awful!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0006
rows.name:
U-um... To explain
from the beginning...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0007
rows.name: I used to live in Acedia.

rows.label: qst003201_msg0008
rows.name:
But they said Acedia was done for,
so we had to evacuate by ship.

rows.label: qst003201_msg0009
rows.name:
Everyone from the refugee
camp just swarmed the port.

rows.label: qst003201_msg0010
rows.name:
Luckily I got on a Divine
Beast ship, but when
Bonono-kun tried to board...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0011
rows.name:
BAM! Acedia slammed
into the World Tree.

rows.label: qst003201_msg0012
rows.name:
And then, Bonono-kun went whoooosh,
flying right off Acedia...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0013
rows.name:
He probably fell into the Cloud
Sea and died, or if he was lucky,
he landed on the World Tree...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0014
rows.name:
I don't know which, but if he's
alive, I have to go help him...

rows.label: qst003201_msg0015
rows.name:
R-really?! Please, please
go find Bonono-kun!

rows.label: qst003201_msg0016
rows.name:
If he's safe, I think he'll be on
the outer wall of the World Tree.

rows.label: qst003201_msg0017
rows.name:
If he fell into the Cloud Sea,
then it's hopeless, but...
